channel.title: Pivoting Life
channel.description: Your podcast station about alternative careers and ventures in the sciences. Here, we talk to people who left well-trodden paths and made bold decisions.

item.title: Pilot
item.description: Meet Kathi, a former scientist who leapt into the vibrant world of startups. Xenia, a passionate science communicator bridging the gap between complex research and the public. And Hannes, a professor in information systems, who constantly struggles with the boundaries of academic professions.
